formatRequirements.title: File Format Requirements
formatRequirements.csvHeaders: CSV files must include headers like: title, description, price, type, status, bedrooms, bathrooms, area, address, city, country.
formatRequirements.jsonArray: JSON file must be an array of property objects.
formatRequirements.requiredFields: Required fields for each property: title, description, price, type (e.g., apartment, house), status (e.g., for_sale, for_rent).

validation.fixErrorsBeforeUploading: Please fix the errors listed below before uploading.

trash.confirmDescription: Properties will be moved to the trash and automatically deleted after 14 days. You can restore them from the trash before then.
trash.countMessage_one: You are about to move {{count}} {{properties}} to the trash.
trash.countMessage_other: You are about to move {{count}} {{properties}} to the trash.
trash.countMessage: You are about to move {{count}} {{properties}} to the trash.
trash.successDescription: Properties will be permanently deleted after 14 days
trash.errorDescription: An error occurred. Please try again.
trash.title: Property Trash
trash.trashExpiryWarning: Properties in the trash will be permanently deleted after 14 days
trash.emptyTrashDescription: Items moved to the trash will appear here for 14 days before being permanently deleted
trash.restoreDescription: Restore properties from the trash to your active listings.
trash.restoreCountMessage_one: You are about to restore {{count}} property.
trash.restoreCountMessage_other: You are about to restore {{count}} properties.
trash.deleteForeverDescription: This action cannot be undone. The properties will be permanently deleted.
trash.deleteForeverCountMessage_one: You are about to permanently delete {{count}} property.
trash.deleteForeverCountMessage_other: You are about to permanently delete {{count}} properties.
trash.deleteForeverCountMessage: You are about to permanently delete {{count}} {{properties}}.
trash.emptyTrashCountMessage_one: You are about to permanently delete {{count}} property from the trash.
trash.emptyTrashCountMessage_other: You are about to permanently delete {{count}} properties from the trash.
trash.emptyTrashCountMessage: You are about to permanently delete {{count}} properties from the trash.
trash.restoreSuccessDescription: The selected properties have been restored to your listings
trash.deleteSuccessDescription: The selected properties have been permanently removed
trash.emptySuccessDescription: All properties in the trash have been permanently deleted

plans.title: Choose Your Plan
plans.chooseRightPlan: Choose the right plan for you
plans.description: Select the plan that best fits your needs and unlock premium features.

basic.name: Basic
basic.description: For individuals looking to browse properties

premium.name: Premium
premium.description: For real estate agents and property managers

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.description: For real estate agencies and large businesses

status.title: Subscribe
status.basicMessage: You're currently on the Basic plan. Upgrade to access premium features like bulk uploads, analytics, and more.
status.errorMessage: There was a problem setting up the payment process. Please try again later.
status.activeMessage: Your subscription is active and will automatically renew on {{date}}.
status.canceledMessage: The subscription feature is currently unavailable. Please check back later.
status.paymentIssueMessage: There was a problem with your last payment. Please update your payment method.

cancel.question: Can I cancel my subscription?
cancel.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings.

payment.question: What payment methods are accepted?
payment.answer: We accept all major credit cards and payment providers.

refund.question: Can I get a refund?
refund.answer: Refunds are available according to our refund policy. Please contact support for details.

teamDiscount.question: Is there a discount for teams?
teamDiscount.answer: Yes, we offer discounts for teams and agencies. Contact sales for more information.
